A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a long time fan that has even appreciated TFA\, this movie was a pain in my heart. Complete betrayal to the character of Luke\, extreme cuts from different plot lines (Finn plot line completely pointless except from a cheap critique to the 1% and showing a force sensitive kid). Rey is overpowered with just less than a day total of training and so on\, I'm even tired of thinking about this movie... it makes me physically ill
